About

About

Coffee hour with Sara

Sara Lin is a self-taught web designer and developer who works in behavioral health services. During lockdown she has been working on this website, practicing piano, painting watercolors, populating her patio & windowsills with miscellaneous plant life, and trying out fad food recipes. Sara will be studying at Columbia University as an occupational therapy student in the fall.
